summary: "Modern Family" is an American TV comedy that aired on ABC from 2009 to 2020. It's about three different families in Los Angeles who are connected through Jay Pritchett. The show has an ensemble cast and is filmed like a documentary, with characters talking to the camera. It won many awards, including Emmys and a Golden Globe. The series was very popular and ended after 11 seasons. It made a lot of money, earning over $2 million per episode in 2012.
title: Modern Family
